howItWorks.description: When you send an email, placeholders in the HTML template are replaced with actual recipient data

placeholders.[fullname]: Will be replaced with: Mayor L Webb
placeholders.[company]: Will be replaced with: TWC Business Consulting Group
placeholders.[office]: Will be replaced with: Main Office - TWCBC
placeholders.[location]: Will be replaced with: Cape May, NJ

exampleCSVRow: Mayor L Webb,(609) 555-7842,mayorlwebb@mw.twcbc.com,TWC Business Consulting Group,Cape May, NJ
